channel.title: Functions Practice :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: Letâ€™s try some simple practice problems. These problems are not graded - they are just for you to practice before doing the real exercises in the lab itself. You can find the answers below each question by clicking the button below each question. 6.1 Reading Code Write the output that is displayed to the user after running the following Python program: def foo(word): print(word, end=" ") def bar(word1, word2, word3): foo(word1) foo(word2) print("don't make a", end=" ") print(word3) def main(): bar("two", "wrongs", "right") main() Answer 6.
